languages.text: Restores {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the target. If this ability brings the target to full wounds, this power also removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} effects from the target.
languages.original_text: Восстанавливает цели {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. Если в результате цель полностью исцеляется, то эта способность снимает с нее все эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, обездвиживания и ошеломления, а также исцеляет свежие ранения.

traits.locale_text: Restores <u>(2 × Psyker's psy rating + WP bonus)</u> wounds of the target. If the target is at full wounds at the end of that healing, this power also removes the stunned, bleeding, fatigued, blinded, immobilised, staggered, and fresh injury effects from the target. If the target has several of those effects, all of them are removed.

Restores <u>(2 × psyker's psy rating + WP bonus)</u> wounds to the target. If this ability brings the target to full wounds, this power also removes all stunned, bleeding, fatigued, blinded, immobilised, staggered, and fresh injury effects from the target.

languages.text: 为目标恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9}。如果此能力将目标生命值回满，则额外移除目标受到的全部{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}效果。

languages.text: {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9}の分だけ、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復させる。このアビリティでターゲットの傷が最大値になる場合は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}生傷{/g}効果から回復する。

languages.text: Restitue {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} à la cible. Si cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} permet à la cible de refaire le plein de blessures dans sa réserve, ce pouvoir dissipe également les effets {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Blessure récente{/g} qu'elle subissait.

languages.text: Hedefin {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanını{/g} tazeler. Kabiliyet, hedefi tam sağlığına kavuşturursa ayrıca hedefin üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g} ve taze {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} etkileri de kaybolur.
languages.original_text: Restores {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the target. If this ability brings the target to full wounds, this power also removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} effects from the target.

traits.locale_text: Hedefin {uip|Heal|f51d5d8fdc8e49c4828c0180868e0be9} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanını{/g} tazeler. Kabiliyet, hedefi tam sağlığına kavuşturursa ayrıca hedefin üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g}, felç, afallama ve taze sakatlık etkileri de kaybolur.
